price: Maze wa muntu warekuwe (mu bari bafunganywe na Yusufu) aza kwibuka nyuma y’igihe (ko atamuvuganiye), maze aravuga ati “Njye ndababwira ibisobanuro byazo, ngaho nimunyohereze (kuri Yusufu).”
arabic: وَقَالَ ٱلَّذِي نَجَا مِنۡهُمَا وَٱدَّكَرَ بَعۡدَ أُمَّةٍ أَنَا۠ أُنَبِّئُكُم بِتَأۡوِيلِهِۦ فَأَرۡسِلُونِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waqāla alladhī najā min'humā wa-iddakara baʿda ummatin anā unabbi-ukum bitawīlihi fa-arsilūni
